description: Streamlined, protective and convenient, the Compact Media Case 20 from Lowepro safeguards your important digital storage devices in one handy location. It features dedicated pockets for an ultra-portable hard drive, up to 4 memory cards and a USB cable. Soft neoprene foam is reinforced to protect contents from impact and provide a snug fit. Additional features include a brushed tricot interior lining and dual, wrap-around zippers. Available in Black.
title: Lowepro Compact Media Case 20 for Portable Hard Drives
